# Changelog

All notable changes to `calendar-links` will be documented in this file

## 1.1.0 - 2018-08-13
- Add all day support

## 1.0.3 - 2018-07-23
- Fix newlines in description

## 1.0.2 - 2018-05-15
- Fix for iCal links in Safari

## 1.0.1 - 2018-04-30
- Use `\n` instead of `%0A` when generating an ics file

## 1.0.0 - 2017-09-29

- initial release
